QuestData.Title: Deceive thy Enemy
QuestData.Description: For every moment I hear silence, you draw closer to your death! SPEAK!$B$BWhat? The camp has revolted? This cannot possibly be true! My minions would not dare undermine my authority.$B$BWell then, every last one of them will pay for this treachery, they will pay dearly. Silence them all and be done with it! Report back to me once you have carried out my order or you shall be dealt with.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 4 Doomforge Attendants and 4 Doomforge Engineers.
QuestData.CompletionText: My patience is tiring, why have you not finished them?
QuestData.RewardText: That will surely teach those that don't do as I say...$B$BBy the way... where is Doomcryer? Why have you reported this revolt to me and not she?
